特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（言語と文化Ａ）（CIEC）/Language and Culture in Japan A（国際学部）
授業方法: Face to face : The class is delivered using combination of lecture and group work style in class. There will be lectures, and quite a few group discussions. Students will also work on their small research projects in group, which require readings, research and group presentation by Power Point.

第3回: Some characteristics of the Japanese language (1)
第4回: Some characteristics of the Japanese language (2)
第11回: Group consciousness and the Japanese language
トピック.授業外学習2:
Students are expected to read the reading assignment for each class, work on their group projects (discussions and preparing for presentations), and work for their individual papers and the final exam.
They are expected to spend about three hours a week for their assignments.

教科書/Required texts0:
Reading assignments (about 20 to 30 pages of required reading a week in English) will be prepared and uploaded in LUNA each week by the instructor.
Please check LUNA before the first class.The handouts will be also delivered in class and by LUNA.
The material for the first two classes will be uploaded here by Sep.14 for the students who do not have access to LUNA.
